name: HAMSCREAM
description:
Use your voice (from your microphone) to power up the platforms to reach the crystals and win the game! 

2D platform game created for gamejam BIT Festival 2022 (https://bit.bestgliwice.pl/) in Gliwice and took 2nd place.

Authors:

  • Julia Merta
  • Filip Gaida
  • Żaklina Osmenda
  • Łukasz Kubicki

Controls:

A D, Left Right  Move left or rightSpace, Down Button JumpEscape, Start Open menu

Game supports controllers.
